name: Мыло жидкое Absolut Nature ромашка, 250мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide DEA, Sodium Chlroide, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer (and) Coco-Gluciside, Parfum (Butylphenyl Methylpropional), Triclocarban, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA/ Disodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.
